mapper.insert: INSERT INTO shopcart (mno, sno, pno, scount) VALUES (#{mno}, #{sno}, #{pno}, #{scount})
mapper.select: SELECT shopcart.*, product.pname as pname, product.pimg1_org as pimg1_org, product.pprice as pprice FROM shopcart LEFT JOIN product ON shopcart.pno = product.pno ORDER BY shopcart.sno ASC
